items.sentence: It's quiet now, but earlier, it was very noisy in here.
I can't find the dustpan. Did you do something with it?
Tom didn't seem to be interested in talking about that.
Why don't you make yourself useful and wash the dishes?
If it hadn't been for Tom's advice, we might've failed.
On average, how many cups of coffee do you drink a day?
I wasn't sleeping in class. I just zoned out for a bit.
You may eat anything as long as you don't eat too much.
Whether we win or lose, I won't have any hard feelings.
Who's the person sitting at the other end of the table?
